install.name: Article Rating
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Gareth Flowers. All rights reserved
install.author: Gareth Flowers
install.description: Add a predefined rating to an article. Syntax: {rating}NUMBER{/rating}

param.name: beforetext
param.label: Before Content
param.description: Content to display before the rating

param.name: aftertext
param.label: After Content
param.description: Content to display after the rating

param.name: show
param.label: Ratings Type
param.description: Displays either a text and/or image version of the rating

param.name: imagetextorder
param.label: Display Order
param.description: Display the Image or Text version of the rating first

param.name: imageset
param.label: Image Set
param.description: Image Set to use when images are enabled

param.name: imagecustom
param.label: Custom Image URL
param.description: A url to a custom image to use for the image (requires the 'custom' Image Set to be selected)

param.name: imagecustomhalf
param.label: Custom Half Image URL
param.description: A url to a custom image to use for the half image (requires the 'custom' Image Set to be selected)
